text: @GOVUK Shut down meatmarkets why are we increasing disease &climate deadly animal ag in the uk, why is the source of the worst death causing diseases not Already shut down? If a fruit had caused covid19 by now all sources wld be banned - yet a plate of flesh is worth how many lives? https://t.co/lm9AuDmEpZ
